submission:
import collections
class Solution:
    def countSubarrays(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        ans = 0
        mem = collections.Counter({})
        for x in nums:
            mem_new = collections.Counter({x: 1})
            for y, c in mem.items():
                mem_new[x & y] += c
            # mem_new[y] += 1
            mem = mem_new
            ans += mem[k]
            # print(mem)
        return ans
